climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: EXTRA LARGE AND COMFORTABLE HEAVYWEIGHT CHAIR - This home office chair has a wider and thicker seat cushion, better suited for taller people, and can hold up to 500 pounds. The extra large seat cushion (seat cushion size: 22D" X 26.77W", 4.33" thick) will bring you a more comfortable experience;

ADJUSTABLE LUMBAR SUPPORT - This heavy duty office chair is designed with adjustable lumbar support to control the lumbar vertebrae forward and backward, effectively relieving pressure on the lumbar spine area;

COMFORTABLE AND BREATHABLE MATERIALS - The surface of the big and tall office chair is designed with high-quality mesh fabric, which is breathable; the thickened sponge sits with high resilience and softness like foam, and the cushion adopts a waterfall front seat edge design, which eliminates pressure on the calves and promotes blood circulation;

MULTIFUNCTIONAL ADJUSTABLE - This computer desk chair features flexible 4D armrests made of metal to provide comfortable support for your arms and shoulders. The height-adjustable office chair on wheels not only swivels 360°, the tilt tension knob underneath the seat controls the tension of the backrest to provide you with the optimal resting angle;

HIGH QUALITY CRAFTING CRAFT - Every accessory of this mesh office chair is made of high quality metal material, the lifting and lowering air bar is made of 3-stage cylinder, which is SGS and BIFIMA certified, and the metal base is more reliable and sturdy, with a maximum load capacity of 500lbs!

Heavy-duty office chair with adjustable rocking mode
4D Adjustable Armrest Multiple options for multiple comforts! Adjustable Lumbar Support Comfortable supportive posture is good for health!
Previous page Next page 1 Comfortable Cushion Seat 2 3D Ajustable Armrest

360° swivel office chair The 360° swivel office chair provides you with a more efficient and flexible way of working and living. Adjust-backrest rocking model This cushion-height adjustable computer chair adapts to more types of desks; the chair's own rocking mode offers a more comfortable relaxing posture. Max weight capacity 500 lbs This heavy-duty office chair is made with premium lift cylinders to ensure smooth lifting, as well as high-quality materials to support up to 500 lbs! Quiet and resistant to wear The wheels of this ergonomic office chair are made of wear-resistant nylon material, which makes the sliding more flexible and quieter.

Does this chair really have a maximum load capacity of 500lbs? Yes, we have gone through many weight tests before delivery to ensure that the weight capacity of this heavy duty office chair reaches 500lbs, you can rest assured to use it. How long does it take to install this home office chair and does it require the assistance of another installation tool? The box contains installation instructions for this office chair, as well as an installation tool that you can follow to complete the installation in 15-30 minutes! What is the chair's backrest width and cushion depth? The width of the backrest (18.5") of this office chair is: , the depth (22") of the cushion seat is: ; the wide seat provides you with more comfort; Is the backrest and base of the office chair sturdy? The office chair is designed with ergonomic lumbar support and the base is made of high quality metal material, which is not only strong but also durable; What is the height of the seat? The height of this height adjustable office chair from the floor to the cushion seat is: 18.5"-22.44" and the adjustable height is:3.9"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I've only had this chair for a week so, as far as longevity I have no idea. Assembly was fairly easy and did not take long. I did need someone to hold the chair at one point though when getting screws in so may be tricky to assemble solo.The chair is sturdy I do not feel like it is going to break or sway when I sit in it, however. I read a review about the armrests being annoying because they do not lock into place and this is 100% accurate.It is pretty annoying but not the end of the world. I like that they can move around there just should be a locking feature so I'm confused about why they lack this seems like common sense.I've already read a ton of reviews on chairs like these that say the but cushion goes flat quickly which will be a bummer when I and anyone else needs to sit in 40 hours a week for work.I'll edit this review after another month or two but so far so good.The wide seat is super comfortable being larger and having larger hips. Finally don't have armrests digging into the side of my thighs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Chair is great Quality!! It’s very sturdy for us heavy people lol. The arms aren’t tight on the hips and the cushion is really thick i was surprised at how comfortable it was compared to my old faithful work chair, but glad i made the upgrade. It also was easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you’re a bigger person this chair is perfect!! sturdy , wide seat , comfortable for hours . Very simple to assemble . 10/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not perfect but close
reviews.reviewText: It arrived 4 days earlier than expected.For a heavy duty chair was frugally priced, seems sturdy, mesh back - cool and my cats won't scratch at it, solid and adjustable arm rests, easily adjustable (up/down) lumbar support.Easy to assemble, had a good tool, the bolts were packaged in bundles by the assembly steps (except 2 long bolts for the arm anchors were with the long bolts from and earlier step), printing was clear when needed.Attaching the back to the seat, was awkward, I used a box to support the back, and was able to do the entire assembly w/o assistanceIn fact it went so well (and had spare bolts) it encouraged me to repair the chair it replaced, my extra bolts weren't able to be used (wrong diameter) but found some others that would work on another old chair. so now have a back-up instead of another waiting to be disposed of.it sits both lower and higher than my old chair, controls are easy to use, also a little narrower than my old chair - which I like, can still cross a leg and lean back, just don't slide side to side.The reason its not perfect was the final piece, a molded part that fits over the seat back bolts, mine was incompletely molded, one of the 2 top tabs was only partially there. that part is not as tight as it could be, but not worth sending the chair back, it is still pretty snug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I received the package as usual from Amazon, on point. It was not damaged and nothing missing. I am not a young, strong man and I thought I would not be able to assemble the chair alone. But to my surprise, it was not difficult at all to assemble. Instructions and parts were packaged and labeled clearly. I had to get creative once when connecting the back of the chair to the seat. The chair is very comfortable and roomy. I love love love the armrests. I gave it 4 stars only because I just got it two days ago. I will, maybe, write another review after time has passed to give an update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this chair!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is sturdy and easy to assemble. My only quasi-complaint is that the armrests move around all the time and you can’t lock them in place. Otherwise, this chair is comfortable and glides smoothly on my floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: First, The Sweetcrispy Big and Tall Office Desk Chair arrived much earlier than expected. It arrived on the 24th of January which was 6 days ahead of the scheduled delivery date of January 30th.Second, It was very easy to assemble. Everything plus extra bolts was included. The instructions where very easy to follow.As I sit in this chair I like the fact that unlike another chair I got just as the pandemic started. The base is metal and NOT plastic like the iooHug Big and Tall Gaming Chair I brought back in Sept. 2021. I had to get a Chair Base Replacement, when the plastic base wheel broke after getting stuck in a hole my friend made in the floor tile.This Chair also has better back support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble. (I did it myself)It is super comfortable and feels sturdy.It is so good, that my husband stole mine and I had to get another one.
